hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
docker stop hpds && docker rm hpds
docker stop httpd && docker rm httpd
docker stop wildfly && docker rm wildfly
DANGLING_CONTAINER_EXITS="$(docker ps --all --quiet --filter "status=exited" --filter "status=created")" echo $DANGLING_CONTAINER_EXITSS if [ ! -z "$DANGLING_CONTAINER_EXITS" ]; then echo "Removing unsed and not running containers" docker stop $(docker ps --all --quiet --filter "status=exited" --filter "status=created") && docker rm -f $(docker ps --all --quiet --filter "status=exited" --filter "status=created" --filter "status=stopped") fi if [ -z "$DANGLING_CONTAINER_EXITS" ]; then echo "No containers are in error state to cleanup" else echo "Unable to clean up below containers please manually inspect and Delete them" echo "$DANGLING_CONTAINER_EXITS" fi
sed '/wildfly/d' /etc/hosts > hosts.new && cat hosts.new > /etc/hosts sed '/httpd/d' /etc/hosts > hosts.new && cat hosts.new > /etc/hosts sed '/hpds/d' /etc/hosts > hosts.new && cat hosts.new > /etc/hosts
